column4: Advance to Duck Pond - If you pass Go, collect $200
column7: Advance to Howard - if you pass Go, collect $200
column10: Advance token to nearest Utility. If unowned, you may buy it. If owned, throw dice and pay owner a totel ten times the amount thrown.
column13: Advance token to nearest Railroad and pay owner twice the rental. If unowned, you may buy it.
column16: Advance token to nearest Railroad and pay owner twice the rental. If unowned, you may buy it.
column28: Go to Jail - Do not pass Go, do not collect $200
column31: Make general repairs on all your property - For each house pay $25 - For each hotel $100
column37: Take a trip to Grant Street - If you pass Go, collect $200
column40: Take a walk on Montana Hall - Advance token to Montana Hall
column43: You have been elected Chairman of the Board - Pay each player $50
